labels.role_reason: Continues discussion on AI safety and trustworthiness.

Clarifies the non-anthropomorphic sense of ASI friendliness.
Defines 'friendly' as not harming humans, especially extinction.

States the bitter lesson: human knowledge in systems doesn't work.

Provides examples of systems that learn from data (AlphaGo, Spiral).
Emphasizes reliance on exponential growth in computation.

Concludes that learning systems are the only effective approach.
